abstracts.cdata!:
Ratings for the Avian Influenza Control
            and Human Pandemic Preparedness and Response Project for
            Nigeria were as follows: outcome was moderately
            satisfactory; risk to development outcome was significant;
            bank performance was satisfactory; borrower performance
            moderately satisfactory. The objective of this project is to
            minimize the threat posed to the poultry industry and humans
            by highly pathogenic avian influenza infection and other
            zoonoses and to prepare for, control, and respond to
            influenza pandemics and other infectious disease emergencies
            in humans. This evaluation uses the statement in the
            financing agreement, which adds objectives to incorporate
            zoonotic and other infectious diseases beyond avian
            influenza. The objectives were not revised during implementation.
